div.head: General (technical) remarks
div.p: This web application is mainly driven by data encoded in XML/TEI. Therefore we decided to build this web application upon the native XML-database eXist-db and the main server-side application logic is implemented in xQuery and XSLT whereas client-side functions are based upon JavaScript.
The code of this application can be found on GitHub.
Application architecture/layout and core functionalities are based upon generic-de-web-app. Please refer to How to build a digital edition web app for further information.

The applications serves some basic purposes.
Publish the XML/TEI documents of the abstracts of the TEI conference 2016
Publish those XML/TEI documents in a reader friendly way, i.e. as nicely rendered HTML pages.
Enable some basic index based (index of authors) search
Provide some full text search with KWIC results.
Beside those basic features the application should also provide some analysis of its underlying data.
